title: The Magician
creator_credit: Tadeusz Makarczynski, Walter Reade, Semafor Studios and Sterling Educational Films
brief_description: An anti-war film in the form of an allegory. A magician attracts a group of children at a beach. At first he amuses them with innocent tricks but gradually they are led into playing with guns, the guns finally become real.
